member.name: T:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings
member.summary: Settings for the .

member.name: M:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.ClientBaseClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the full name of the base class.

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.ConfigurationClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the full name of the configuration class ( must be set).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.GenerateExceptionClasses
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to generate exception classes (default: true).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.ExceptionClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the exception class (supports the '{controller}' placeholder, default 'ApiException').

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.InjectHttpClient
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an HttpClient instance is injected into the client (default: true).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.DisposeHttpClient
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to dispose the HttpClient (injected HttpClient is never disposed, default: true).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.ProtectedMethods
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of methods with a protected access modifier ("classname.methodname").

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.UseHttpClientCreationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to call CreateHttpClientAsync on the base class to create a new HttpClient instance (cannot be used when the HttpClient is injected).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.UseHttpRequestMessageCreationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to call CreateHttpRequestMessageAsync on the base class to create a new HttpRequestMethod.

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.WrapDtoExceptions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether DTO exceptions are wrapped in a SwaggerException instance (default: true).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.ClientClassAccessModifier
member.summary: Gets or sets the client class access modifier (default: public).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.UseBaseUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use and expose the base URL (default: true).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.GenerateBaseUrlProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to generate the BaseUrl property, must be defined on the base class otherwise (default: true).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.GenerateSyncMethods
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to generate synchronous methods (not recommended, default: false).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.HttpClientType
member.summary: Gets or sets the HttpClient type which will be used in the generation of the client code. By default the System.Net.Http.HttpClient will be used, but this can be overridden. Just keep in mind that the type you specify has the same default HttpClient method signatures.

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.ParameterDateTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format for DateTime type method parameters (default: "s").

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.GenerateUpdateJsonSerializerSettingsMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to generate the UpdateJsonSerializerSettings method (must be implemented in the base class otherwise, default: true).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.SerializeTypeInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to serialize the type information in a $type property (not recommended, also sets TypeNameHandling = Auto).

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.QueryNullValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the null value used for query parameters which are null (default: '').

member.name: P:NSwag.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpClientGeneratorSettings.ExposeJsonSerializerSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to expose the JsonSerializerSettings property (default: false).
